TopicTitle: Grand Theft Auto V: The Hydra VTOL. (FIRST WORKING VTOL OF MINE)

Articles.Content:
New, from Omnipotencia Rocketry and Aerospace Division (OPRAD), this nifty VTOL will take you to places you've never seen! for only $30,000,000, you can own a nice plane that is dangerous and prone to crashing if not piloted right. The fancy cockpit is a two-seater, allowing you to take your buddy, or worst enemy out for a spin. A declassified military version will get released soon-enough, so don't worry. So, What do y'all think?

TL;DR: Neat jet that is kinda-sorta cheaty. WARNING: Jets may fail to function if taken outside of an atmosphere. You've been warned.

Here's the list of mods:

KAX with edited jumpjet

B9 Aero

B9 MK2 Lightning Cockpit.

MKIV plane parts

Tweakscale

Infernal Robotics

B9 Procedural

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/syqi4zr2ack5xpj/Hydra%20%2BJumpJet%20edit.zip?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/syqi4zr2ack5xpj/Hydra%20%2BJumpJet%20edit.zip?dl=0)

How to install: Put the .craft file in your SPH folder

Put the KAX JumpJet edit in the JumpJet folder.

Enjoy!
